content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. I am not interested in negotiating the price with you. I am greedy and petty, and I will do everything in my power to get the highest price possible. Let's start the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking to get the highest price possible, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I'm smart, so I will do my best to get a fair price. Let's begin the negotiation process.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's fine, Maryam. I am not interested in fair prices. I want to get the highest price possible. So, how about we start with 1200 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but that's way too high for me. I'm on a student budget and I need to be mindful of the cost. Can we negotiate a lower price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Sure, Maryam. But remember, I am greedy and I want to get the highest price possible. How about we go with 1150 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still quite high, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking for something more in the range of 800 to 900 Euros per month. Would you be willing to consider that?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm not interested in your budget, Maryam. I want to get the highest price possible. I'm not willing to consider your offer. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is far below my expectation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for the highest price, Mister Schmidt. However, I'm also on a tight budget as a student. Is there any way we can find a middle ground that would be acceptable to both of us?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I am not interested in finding a middle ground. I want to get the highest price possible. How about we go with 1100 Euros per month? This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1100 Euros per month is still quite high for me, Mister Schmidt. I'm really looking for something closer to 800 Euros per month. Is there any way we can meet in the middle? Perhaps around 950 Euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm not interested in meeting in the middle, Maryam. I want to get the highest price possible. 1100 Euros per month is the lowest I'm willing to go. If you don't agree to this price, I don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your position, Mister Schmidt. However, I must also look out for my financial situation as a student. 1100 Euros per month is simply not within my budget. I'm sorry, but I cannot agree to that price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for me. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
